StringTable.Label: ColonyCapital_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides the basic needs of a Core World.

StringTable.Label: StripMine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Strip mine your world for fun and profit. Mostly profit.

StringTable.Label: ColonialLeadershipCouncil_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Establish a formal council to oversee and harness the potential of the best and brightest individuals within our civilization.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Unlocks Leader Screen[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: TowerOfEndlessNight_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A center for our most morally ambiguous military planning. Needs to operate with discretion, so it cannot be built on our homeworld.[BR][BR]+10 Culture Points once.

StringTable.Label: WorldheartBorehole_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A borehole large enough to penetrate the planet's crust. Too dangerous to build on our homeworld.

StringTable.Label: InfiniteGarden_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A legendary garden that is not only beautiful and fertile, but it will also attract three Baratak Farmers citizens as caregivers. Cannot be built on our homeworld.[BR][BR]Gain caretakers and +10 Culture Points once.

StringTable.Label: ComputerCore_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to jumpstart our research.

StringTable.Label: KazarsMainframe_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A wonder of invention and madness.

StringTable.Label: GalacticMainframe_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides a central hub for our research efforts. Cannot be built on our homeworld.

StringTable.Label: AIOverseer_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Crime reduction across all our worlds. Control generation per scientist on planet. However, the constant surveillance angers citizens but only on this world.

StringTable.Label: CoordinationBeacon_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to directly communicate with any and all colonies more effectively.

StringTable.Label: BureaucraticOffices_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Kilometers of cubicles provide oversight and [HS=HS_Control]Control[/HS].

StringTable.Label: CentralBank_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides your biggest source of raw economic output.

StringTable.Label: Starport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases shipyard manufacturing by easing the transportation of materials to space and increases ship speed by 1 for ships constructed here.

StringTable.Label: ColonialGenerator_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A massive source of power production to increase manufacturing on this planet.

StringTable.Label: StellarForge_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A massive starship foundry for providing material to the orbiting shipyard. Cannot be constructed on your Capital world.

StringTable.Label: DurantiumProcessor_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Converts Durantium into a powerful manufacturing material.

StringTable.Label: IndustrialCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The center of your civilization's manufacturing.

StringTable.Label: SupplyDepot_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Streamlines the distribution of goods and supplies to residents, improving productivity and comfort.

StringTable.Label: FusionPowerPlant_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes factories more efficient, and boosts Production.

StringTable.Label: SingularityPowerPlant_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides a Manufacturing bonus to all your worlds.

StringTable.Label: ManufacturingCapital_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A unique improvement that greatly boosts Production and Pollution.

StringTable.Label: Wonder_BeaconOfBabylon_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Universal Communication platform that vastly increases the influence of the civilization and planet.

StringTable.Label: TechnologicalCapital_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A unique improvement that greatly boosts Research and Influence.

StringTable.Label: VirtualWorld_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This virtual world is indistinguishable from reality and provides new entertainment opportunities for our citizens, no matter where they are.

StringTable.Label: EyesOfUniverse_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Locates the homeworld of all the hyperdrive-capable civilizations.

StringTable.Label: KimbreysRefuge_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Professor Taylor's Uganda growing techniques produce food on an alien world.

StringTable.Label: ColonialClinic_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a planet's population growth rate.

StringTable.Label: Clinic1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a planet's population growth rate.

StringTable.Label: Clinic2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a planet's population growth rate.

StringTable.Label: Clinic3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a planet's Growth and Approval.

StringTable.Label: Clinic4_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a planet's Growth and Approval.

StringTable.Label: OrganMarket_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Dramatically increases the planet's Growth and Crime.

StringTable.Label: PlanetaryConversion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to convert a unproductive tile into a useful one.

StringTable.Label: TerraformingModule_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Terraform one tile of decent quality.

StringTable.Label: TerraformingPlant_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Terraform one tile of decent quality.

StringTable.Label: HabitatImprovementPlant_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Terraform one tile of lesser quality.

StringTable.Label: EngineeredLandslide_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Terraform one useless tile at the cost of increased [HS=HS_Pollution]Pollution[/HS].

StringTable.Label: PlanetaryDome_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases the Resistance of a colony.

StringTable.Label: OrbitalDefensePlatform_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides a defending force of assault fighters.

StringTable.Label: DiplomaticMinistry_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Facilitates relations with other races, and helps spread Influence.

StringTable.Label: AssimilationFoundation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Influence of all worlds in our civilization.

StringTable.Label: CulturalBeacon_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Influence of this planet, and provides +10 Culture Points.

StringTable.Label: IridiaExchange_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases wealth, and supports nearby infrastructure greatly.[BR][BR]+20 Culture Points once.

StringTable.Label: GalacticStockExchange_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the gross Income of all our worlds.

StringTable.Label: FinancialCapital_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A unique improvement that greatly boosts Income and Influence.

StringTable.Label: TradeNetwork_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Establishes a central hub for traders to buy and sell products and services.

StringTable.Label: GalacticBazar_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Trade Income from trade routes across our civilization.

StringTable.Label: EntertainmentCapital_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A unique improvement that greatly boosts Approval, Influence and Crime.

StringTable.Label: HeritageCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows visitors from alien worlds to learn a little bit about our history.

StringTable.Label: HallOfTradition_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A building dedicated to our civilizations heritage, folklore, values, and traditions.

StringTable.Label: UnionCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A hall for planning collective bargining for our laborers.

StringTable.Label: SharkTank_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A center for investors to tear equity off of the planets best inventions and buisnesses.

StringTable.Label: InnovationComplex_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A central research hub for development of our most import scientific projects.

StringTable.Label: HyperionShrinker_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Hyperion Shrinking technology creates a modest reduction in the volume of various ship components, leaving more room for whatever else our ship designers choose.

StringTable.Label: SpiceMarket_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows visitors from alien worlds to sample the tastes of our civilization.

StringTable.Label: GrandCasino_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A great way to attract tourists, and criminals, to your colony.

StringTable.Label: GalacticZoo_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Collects the most amazing and bizarre creatures from across the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: UtopianResort_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The ideal place to cleanse your mind, body, spirit, and bank account.

StringTable.Label: RestaurantEternity_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A legendary restaurant serving species from across the galaxy other species from across the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: PrisonLaborCamp_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides +15%% [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] per Prisoner on the planet.

StringTable.Label: PrisonResearchLab_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides +15%% [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] per Prisoner on the planet.

StringTable.Label: BlackMarket_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a world's Crime but provides access to illicit goods.

StringTable.Label: MercenaryCamp_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases [HS=HS_Resistance]Resistance[/HS] on the planet, and generates a free Leader.

StringTable.Label: ShrineoftheMithrilar_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Approval and Tourism of a world.

StringTable.Label: ShrineofTandis_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Approval and Tourism on all of your worlds.

StringTable.Label: CoordinationTemple_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Gives Adjacency Bonus to all adjacent Improvements.

StringTable.Label: ShadowTemple_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Make this world the focus of political intrigue.

StringTable.Label: TidePools_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a world's Influence and Approval.[BR][BR]Can only be built on Oceanic worlds.

StringTable.Label: BarrierReef_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a world's Influence and Planetary Defense.[BR][BR]Can only be built on Oceanic worlds.

StringTable.Label: ExoticHatchery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a world's Tourism.[BR][BR]Can only be built on Oceanic worlds.

StringTable.Label: KrynnConsulate_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a world's Influence and Approval.

StringTable.Label: KrynniacTemple_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a world's Influence and Approval.

StringTable.Label: KrynniacMission_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a world's Influence and Approval.

StringTable.Label: KrynniacOrder_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a world's Influence and Approval.

StringTable.Label: KrynniacMinistry_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a world's Influence and Approval.

StringTable.Label: KrynniacSanctuary_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The High Temple of the Way. Increases a world's Influence and Approval.

StringTable.Label: MonumentRosalind_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases a world's Influence and Approval.

StringTable.Label: KrynniacAltar_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A sacred place for the Krynn. This is needed to bring their colonists to your world.

StringTable.Label: BaratakGrove_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This beautiful grove will provide a perfect home for the Baratak that want to come to our world.

StringTable.Label: TorianAcademy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This campus will serve as the perfect location for the Torian Scientists to complete their experiments.

StringTable.Label: CrucibleLab_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A lab dedicated to producing Crucible Vapors, a highly addictive substance prized by the Lantern.

StringTable.Label: MantiPool_ShortDec
StringTable.String: If we are to draw the Manti to the world we will need to build this birthing pool for them.[BR][BR]Can only be built on Lake terrain.

StringTable.Label: Project_ScanPlanet_ShortDec
StringTable.String: We can scan our planet for the remains of crashed alien vessels.

StringTable.Label: Project_InvestigateMurder_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Colonists have been reported missing. Send out search parties to uncover what is happening.

StringTable.Label: Project_MissingColonists_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Colonists have been reported missing. Send out search parties to uncover what is happening.

StringTable.Label: HallOfUnity_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A place for people across the galaxy to meet and marvel at its wonders.[BR][BR]+20 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: AstrolabOfTheArnor_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The perfect precision of this device benefits every aspect of our society.[BR][BR]+30 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: InfiniteArchive_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Able to store the complete history of the galaxy.[BR][BR]+75 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: GrandMenagerie_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The galaxy's most exotic animals live in freedom and comfort in open environments designed for their needs.[BR][BR]+40 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: NewEden_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Travelers from across the galaxy will come to visit this tranquil garden.[BR][BR]+50 [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS]

StringTable.Label: ManufactureLife_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Produce a new Citizen for your Civilization.

StringTable.Label: Bob_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A perfect, simulated version of our brightest researcher without physical limitations.

StringTable.Label: XenoAnthropology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Boosts the relations with other races, and helps spread our influence.

StringTable.Label: WeatherControlCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves a planet by boosting Approval, lowering Maintenance, and increasing Manufacturing.

StringTable.Label: WeatherControlZenith_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves a planet by boosting Approval, lowering Maintenance, and increasing Manufacturing.

StringTable.Label: AntimatterPowerPlant_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly increases the abilities of all adjacent improvements, but requires Antimatter to build.

StringTable.Label: AidResearch_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides 100 research. Can only be used on a planet with a Technological Capital.

StringTable.Label: RecruitClone_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Grow a new Clone citizen. Clones are almost as good as real citizens. Almost...

StringTable.Label: WildlandRefuge_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces Pollution based on its level, as well as being a popular Tourist destination.

StringTable.Label: MemoryCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Intelligence of citizens on this world.

StringTable.Label: AugmentationCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Intelligence of citizens across our empire.

StringTable.Label: WarforgedFoundry_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides starting experience to ships built at this planet's shipyard.

StringTable.Label: NaturalLeagueCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Planetary headquarters for the Natural League. Increases a planet's Growth rate substantially.

StringTable.Label: GovernorsManor_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A prominent display of the governor's power and influence.

StringTable.Label: Industry_Drones_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Drones are required to unlock new technologies.

StringTable.Label: Industry_Modules_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Produces Starbase modules. Modules are required to upgrade your starbases.

StringTable.Label: Industry_Modules_Colony_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Use your Core World to produce Starbase modules. Modules are required to upgrade your starbases.

StringTable.Label: Industry_Modules_Shipyard_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Use your shipyard to produce Starbase modules. Modules are required to upgrade your starbases.

StringTable.Label: Industry_Nanobots_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Nanobots are required to upgrade your colonies.

StringTable.Label: Mission_Research_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Generate research by having your Shipyard study the surrounding area.

StringTable.Label: Mission_Credits_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Subsidizes a private venture to unknown places to find and collect valuable artifacts.

StringTable.Label: Mission_Slaves_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Sends out Thrall Seekers to find beings who didn't realize they were our property.

StringTable.Label: Mission_Production_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Generate planetary production by having your Shipyard produce building materials.

StringTable.Label: Mission_Resources_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Scavengers claim they can find some rare resources.

StringTable.Label: Mission_HeliosOre_ShortDec
StringTable.String: By contracting with our most knowledgeable traders, they claim they will bring Helios Ore.

StringTable.Label: Mission_HarmonyCrystal_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These traders might not have come by their goods through completely legal means, but the results speak for themselves.

StringTable.Label: Mission_HyperSilicates_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Small Hyper Silicate deposits are mapped and their locations sold to the highest bidder.

StringTable.Label: Mission_Influence_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Generate Influence by sending out pilgrims from your shipyard.

StringTable.Label: ThuliumCatalyst_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Rare planetary deposit that can be mined for Thulium.

StringTable.Label: ThuliumCatalystL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Can be used to mine rare deposits of Thulium useful for certain types of weapons, and also increases wealth on planet.

StringTable.Label: ThuliumCatalystL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the yields of Thulium Mines.

StringTable.Label: ThuliumCatalystL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the yields of Thulium Mines.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_ThuliumCatalyst_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Can be used to mine rare deposits of Thulium useful for certain types of weapons, and also increases wealth on planet.

StringTable.Label: CrystallizedElerium_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Rare planetary deposit that can be mined for Elerium, which is used in energy weapons.

StringTable.Label: CrystallizedEleriumL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Can be used to mine rare deposits of Crystallized Elerium, and increase wealth.

StringTable.Label: CrystallizedEleriumL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the yields of Crystallized Elerium Mines.

StringTable.Label: CrystallizedEleriumL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the yields of Crystallized Elerium Mines.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_CrystallizedElerium_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Can be used to mine rare deposits of Crystallized Elerium, and increase wealth.

StringTable.Label: PrometheusStone_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Rare planetary deposit of solidified Promethion that can be mined.

StringTable.Label: PrometheusStoneL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Can be used to mine rare deposits of Prometheus Stone, which is also valuable in trade.

StringTable.Label: PrometheusStoneL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the yields of Prometheus Stone Mines.

StringTable.Label: PrometheusStoneL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the yields of Prometheus Stone Mines.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_PrometheusStone_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Can be used to mine rare deposits of Prometheus Stone, which is also valuable in trade.

StringTable.Label: HeliosOre_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A beautiful, exotic metal popular in many luxury items.

StringTable.Label: HeliosOreL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A beautiful, exotic metal popular in many luxury items.

StringTable.Label: HeliosOreL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A beautiful, exotic metal popular in many luxury items.

StringTable.Label: HeliosOreL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A beautiful, exotic metal popular in many luxury items.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_HeliosOre_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A beautiful, exotic metal popular in many luxury items.

StringTable.Label: HyperSilicates_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This exotic material is useful in constructing powerful research databanks.

StringTable.Label: HyperSilicatesL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This exotic material is useful in constructing powerful research databanks.

StringTable.Label: HyperSilicatesL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This exotic material is useful in constructing powerful research databanks.

StringTable.Label: HyperSilicatesL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This exotic material is useful in constructing powerful research databanks.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_HyperSilicates_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This exotic material is useful in constructing powerful research databanks.

StringTable.Label: XanthiumDeposit_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A mineral with unusual energy absorption properties, Xanthium is prized by shipbuilders around the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: XanthiumDepositL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This rare metal is prized by shipbuilders around the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: XanthiumDepositL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This rare metal is prized by shipbuilders around the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: XanthiumDepositL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This rare metal is prized by shipbuilders around the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_XanthiumDeposit_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This rare metal is prized by shipbuilders around the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorNanites_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These relics can be found dormant on many worlds. Endlessly trying to prepare the galaxy for their lost masters, Precursor Nanites can be an effective ground combat weapon.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorNanitesL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Tiny machines increase overall planetary production.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorNanitesL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Tiny machines increase overall planetary production.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorNanitesL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Tiny machines increase overall planetary production.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_PrecursorNanites_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Tiny machines increase overall planetary production.

StringTable.Label: HarmonyCrystals_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These rare and beautiful crystals resonate with a gentle hum that instills a sense of wellbeing in most sentient beings.[BR][BR]Harmony Crystals can be gifted to your [HS=HS_Leaders]Leaders[/HS] to improve their [HS=HS_Loyalty]Loyalty[/HS].

StringTable.Label: HarmonyCrystalsL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These rare and beautiful Crystals resonate with a gentle hum.

StringTable.Label: HarmonyCrystalsL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These rare and beautiful Crystals resonate with a gentle hum.

StringTable.Label: HarmonyCrystalsL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These rare and beautiful Crystals resonate with a gentle hum.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_HarmonyCrystals_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These rare and beautiful Crystals resonate with a gentle hum.

StringTable.Label: TechapodHive_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These small six-limbed semi-intelligent creatures are near perfect mimics, and can be trained to do simple tasks. They are often used to take care of menial tasks in the cramped confines of starships.

StringTable.Label: TechapodHiveL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These small creatures can be trained to do menial tasks on starships.

StringTable.Label: TechapodHiveL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These small creatures can be trained to do menial tasks on starships.

StringTable.Label: TechapodHiveL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These small creatures can be trained to do menial tasks on starships.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_TechapodHive_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These small creatures can be trained to do menial tasks on starships.

StringTable.Label: SnugglerColony_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These incredibly furry and soft creatures are the dream pet for all children in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: SnugglerColonyL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These furry creatures are the dream pet for all children in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: SnugglerColonyL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These furry creatures are the dream pet for all children in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: SnugglerColonyL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These furry creatures are the dream pet for all children in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_SnugglerColony_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These furry creatures are the dream pet for all children in the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: UltraSpice_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Everything tastes better with Arnor Spice, "Arnor spice makes it twice as nice!", This precious spice has been known to make fortunes for entire planets.

StringTable.Label: UltraSpiceL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Arnor Spice expands consciousness, leading to greater research capabilities.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_UltraSpice_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Arnor Spice expands consciousness, leading to greater research capabilities.

StringTable.Label: EpimetheusPollen_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The pollen from this rare flower acts as a natural neural clouding agent, allowing for more effective camouflage.

StringTable.Label: EpimetheusPollenL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The pollen from this rare flower acts as a natural neural clouding agent, as well as providing other exotic chemicals.

StringTable.Label: EpimetheusPollenL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The pollen from this rare flower acts as a natural neural clouding agent, as well as providing other exotic chemicals.

StringTable.Label: EpimetheusPollenL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The pollen from this rare flower acts as a natural neural clouding agent, as well as providing other exotic chemicals.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_EpimetheusPollen_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The pollen from this rare flower acts as a natural neural clouding agent, as well as providing other exotic chemicals.

StringTable.Label: ArtocarpusViriles_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This amazing fruit can be a stable food source on even the most arid planets. It does, however, have the side-effect of making most of the known species in the galaxy more fertile.

StringTable.Label: ArtocarpusVirilesL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This fruit is delicious and increases the fertility of most species.

StringTable.Label: ArtocarpusVirilesL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This fruit is delicious and increases the fertility of most species.

StringTable.Label: ArtocarpusVirilesL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This fruit is delicious and increases the fertility of most species.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_ArtocarpusViriles_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This fruit is delicious and increases the fertility of most species.

StringTable.Label: MonsatiumDeposit_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These nutrient-rich mineral deposits give a tremendous boost to the yields of farms when used as a fertilizer.

StringTable.Label: MonsatiumDepositL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These minerals boost the yield of farms when used as a fertilizer.

StringTable.Label: MonsatiumDepositL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These minerals boost the yield of farms when used as a fertilizer.

StringTable.Label: MonsatiumDepositL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These minerals boost the yield of farms when used as a fertilizer.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_MonsatiumDeposit_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These minerals boost the yield of farms when used as a fertilizer.

StringTable.Label: AurorusArboretum_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These staggeringly beautiful bioluminescent trees stand nearly a kilometer high, and are considered one of the natural wonders of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: AurorusArboretumL1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These bioluminescent trees are one of the natural wonders of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: AurorusArboretumL2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These bioluminescent trees are one of the natural wonders of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: AurorusArboretumL3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These bioluminescent trees are one of the natural wonders of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_AurorusArboretum_ShortDec
StringTable.String: These bioluminescent trees are one of the natural wonders of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Slums_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Vagrant housing, but at least you didn't need to pay anything for it.

StringTable.Label: District_Approval_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes people happier. Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: District_Research_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Research this world provides.

StringTable.Label: District_Influence_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Influence this world provides.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeManufacturing1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Manufacturing Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeManufacturing2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Manufacturing Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeManufacturing3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Manufacturing Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeManufacturing4_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Manufacturing Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeManufacturing5_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Manufacturing Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradePopulation1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Housing Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradePopulation2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Housing Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradePopulation3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Housing Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradePopulation4_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Housing Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradePopulation5_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Housing Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeApproval1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Entertainment Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeApproval2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Entertainment Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeApproval3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Entertainment Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeApproval4_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Entertainment Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeApproval5_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Entertainment Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeWealth1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Financial Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeWealth2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Financial Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeWealth3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Financial Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeWealth4_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Financial Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeWealth5_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Financial Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeFood1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Agricultural Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeFood2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Agricultural Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeFood3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Agricultural Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeFood4_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Agricultural Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeFood5_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Agricultural Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeResearch1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Research Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeResearch2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Research Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeResearch3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Research Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeResearch4_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Research Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeResearch5_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Research Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeInfluence1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Culture Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeInfluence2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Culture Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeInfluence3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Culture Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeInfluence4_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Culture Districts.

StringTable.Label: Project_UpgradeInfluence5_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the level of our Culture Districts.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_PrecursorElevator_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes it easier to ship goods offworld.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_OrbitalFactory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Minerals produced by the colony.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_MoistureGenerator_ShortDec
StringTable.String: By manufacturing water we can make the unusable lands of desert worlds arable.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_ThermalCore_ShortDec
StringTable.String: By heating up the local climate we can produce more arable land.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_TidalControl_ShortDec
StringTable.String: By controlling the tides of this world we can make life better for local colonists.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_PrisonWorld_ShortDec
StringTable.String: By deploying a global prison system we have a place to send all our world's worst criminals.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_ThuliumMoon_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A Moon of precious Thulium is in orbit around this world.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_DurantiumCloud_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The atmosphere glimmers with precious Durantium.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_Accelerator_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The crystallized Promethion will improve the Moves of any ship built from this planet's shipyard.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_Refinery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This ancient Promethion refinery is still in working order.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_Research_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A vast collection of Precursor records.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_Treasury_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A vast collection of Precursor treasures.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_ExperimentalWorld_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The experiments from this world provide valuable research, if the colonists can survive them.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_Satellites_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This satellite array reveals even distant objects.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_OrbOfDraginol_ShortDec
StringTable.String: An ancient relic from a phase of existence outside this one. Slowly builds the might of whoever holds it.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_MakerWorld_ShortDec
StringTable.String: An ancient relic from a phase of existence outside this one. Slowly builds the might of whoever holds it.

StringTable.Label: Wonder_PlagueResearchCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A research facility dedicated to researching a cure for the plague.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_ThinkTank_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A research facility dedicated to experimenting and brainstorming with cutting edge technology.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_ThePossibilityEngine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A research facility dedicated to experimenting and brainstorming with cutting edge technology.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_UnitedPlanets_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A place for divided factions of the universe to unite in a shared vision of prosperity and cooperation.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_GalacticCourt_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The highest court in the galaxy. An appeal here might as well be shouted into the void.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_GalacticCommision_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A place for policies to be made that offer prosperity and peace for the entire galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Supernova_ColonyUpgrade_DefenseMatrix_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides orbital automated defense that improves the overall planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Supernova_ColonyUpgrade_SpaceElevator_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A space elevator dramatically improves the logistics cost of sending raw materials to orbit.

StringTable.Label: Supernova_ColonyUpgrade_OrbitalResearchLab_ShortDec
StringTable.String: There are fewer extraneous variables in the vacuum of space.

StringTable.Label: ColonyUpgrade_RecruitingStation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A space station dedicated to advertising this planet's fantastic qualities and opportunities.

StringTable.Label: Supernova_ColonyUpgrade_ClimateControl_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Orbital satellites can manipulate the weather and improve the planet's fertility.

StringTable.Label: Supernova_ColonyUpgrade_ColonizationCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the rate in which your population generates citizens.

StringTable.Label: Supernova_ColonyUpgrade_OrbitalPrison_ShortDec
StringTable.String: By deploying a global prison system we have a place to send all our world's worst criminals.

StringTable.Label: Supernova_ColonyUpgrade_AtmosphericCleanser_ShortDec
StringTable.String: By cleaning up the atmosphere we can make life better for the planet's inhabitants.

StringTable.Label: Supernova_ColonyUpgrade_SensorArray_ShortDec
StringTable.String: This satellite array reveals even distant objects.

StringTable.Label: Supernova_ColonyUpgrade_ColonialMarket_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A local trade center increases the value of goods on this world.

StringTable.Label: Supernova_ColonyUpgrade_OrbitalAcademy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A place for some of the best and brightest of this planet to study and prepare to be tomorrow's leaders.

StringTable.Label: Supernova_ColonyUpgrade_OrbitalAcademyNew_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A place for some of the best and brightest of this planet to study resulting in a big boost in hitpoints of ships constructed by the associated shipyard..

StringTable.Label: Supernova_ColonyUpgrade_TopGunAcademy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Fighter pilots with a need for speed gather here to hone their skill.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_GalacticNavigationNetwork_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases movement of all ships in your civilization.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_NavigationCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves ship speed from this planet's shipyard.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_GalacticNavigatorsGuild_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases movement speed of ships built from this planet's shipyard.

StringTable.Label: RecyclingCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A massive structure dedicated to reusing materials in order to reduce [HS=HS_Pollution]Pollution[/HS].

StringTable.Label: PainAmplifier_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Constant pain encourages our citizens to focus, increasing our [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] output.

StringTable.Label: ConstructBroadcastModule_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Produces a Broadcast module for our Vault which can be used to broadcast our culture from a target friendly planet.

StringTable.Label: GalacticReserve_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Position your currency as the unifying economic cornerstone of the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: OfficerSchool_ShortDec_TK
StringTable.String: A place for our best and brightest to train and be molded into officers.

StringTable.Label: WarInstitution_ShortDec_TK
StringTable.String: The minutia of every fleet battle in recorded history is studied in the halls of this space station.

StringTable.Label: ConquestCenter_ShortDec_TK
StringTable.String: This spacestation serves as the strategic hub where our brightest strategists study the art of invasions.

StringTable.Label: TacticalCollege_ShortDec_TK
StringTable.String: This spacestation provides comprehensive training in strategies for space-based combat.

StringTable.Label: TacticalInstruction_ShortDec_TK
StringTable.String: Provides in-depth training on the tactics and strategies specific to commanding larger ship classes in space combat.

StringTable.Label: LogisticsArray_ShortDec_TK
StringTable.String: This logistics array spacestation provides extensive training in state control and management of vast interstellar empires.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_TranslightHub_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the number of moves for ships constructed at this shipyard.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_CentralBoreHole_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases manufacturing and will produce secondary boreholes across world.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_HomeBurrow_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Interconnected tunnels that provide comfort and a sharing of knowledge.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_NurtureDen_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A dedicated location for breeding and labor.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_GrowthCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Uses genetic techniques to increase birthrates.

StringTable.Label: VerdureGlobeVault_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Sacred source of our combined cultural heritage.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_EnforcerDen_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Upon completion, turns all current Citizens into Enforcers who increase [HS=HS_Control]Control[/HS] based on the [HS=HS_Crime]Crime[/HS] rate and provide boosts to [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] and [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] and a large boost to [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Income[/HS]. This only happens once.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_IndustrialEspionageCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Steals a tiny percent of the galactic research. Grows over time.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_NeuralLink_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Utilizing the inherent trust of our people to form a neural interface between citizens that grows over time. Citizen intelligence will gradually increase.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_WorldEngine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A massive power generation that taps the core of the planet.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_ElementalFabricator_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes use of the bits of Arnorian technology to create a powerful auto factory.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_AltarOfProcipinee_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Doubles the intelligence of your citizens.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_AutoPrinter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Massively networked printer that increases the productivity of our citizens.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_CommunicationsArray_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Vast communications network that greatly increases the sharing of information between citizens.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_DurantiumScanner_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Sends out a massive pulse to detect the rare metal, Durantium. Upon completion will reveal Durantium on planet and in system.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorRelic_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A discovered piece of ancient Arnorian technology.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_PrecursorRelicScanner_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Will reveal any Precursor Relics on this world and in nearby systems.

StringTable.Label: InterrogationMachine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Place it near population centers to extract knowledge from our people.

StringTable.Label: DeathCamp_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Upon construction supplies several ruined Torians who will be worked to death.

StringTable.Label: GrandResort_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Let's show off our world to other species.[BR][BR]+10 Culture Points once.

StringTable.Label: GreatSchool_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Teaches our citizens, increasing their intelligence.[BR][BR]+10 Culture Points once.

StringTable.Label: FatherTree_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The central nervous system of this world. Attracts three specialized caretakers and will spawn roots upon completion.

StringTable.Label: FatherRoot_ShortDec
StringTable.String: An extension of the Father Tree that has grown to every part of this world.

StringTable.Label: MiningOperation_ShortDesc
StringTable.String: Extracting valuable resources from the planet.

StringTable.Label: DurantiumDeposit_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A small deposit of exotic metal.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_CrystalCore_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A central hub for crystalline knowledge assimilation and distribution. Will spawn shards across world upon completion.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_Crystalize_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves production and will expand the land area of this world by 3 tiles upon completion.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_Facet_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Helps grow our population by generating a scientist and a worker to our world.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_Harmonic_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Magnifies the telepathic abilities of our people.

StringTable.Label: CrystalShard_ShortDec
StringTable.String: A revered crystal shard, believed to contain ancient wisdom and enhance learning.

StringTable.Label: Improvement_PrismaticMatrix_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Assimilates knowledge from other civilizations making it easier for us to use their technologies as our own.

StringTable.Label: AirPurifier_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Undoing some of the damage we are already causing.

StringTable.Label: CentralMine_ShortDesc
StringTable.String: Core hub for efficient resource extraction. Upon completion will start mining operations across the planet.

StringTable.Label: XenoPatentOffice_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Securing and managing alien technology patents for our use.

StringTable.Label: ArmsExpo_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Making a profit from the wages of war.

StringTable.Label: MiningCore_ShortDesc
StringTable.String: High-intensity resource extraction for rapid industrial expansion. Produces Mining Operations on completion.

StringTable.Label: CentauronEmporium_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The galaxy's most exquisite tourist destination.[BR][BR]+5 Culture Points once.

StringTable.Label: VisitorCenter_ShortDec
StringTable.String: An inviting facility tailored for interstellar guests, combining comfort with cultural diversity.
